channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tent and wooden pallet, 11th August
item.description:
There is one tent and three wooden pallet dumped outside the pavement on Granville place

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 458, Oxford Street, Mayfair, London

item.title: Drysdale Dwellings, 11th August
item.description:
For the millionth time the bins at Drysdale Dwellings are overflowing and people are dumping their trash on the public pavement. Forcing pedestrians to walk in the middle of the street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dunn Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Squatting; Orange tent on grass at clapton pond, 11th August
item.description:
A man is living in a tent on clapton pond; orange tent. Has been over 1 week. Park managers have asked him to leave & he is not budging. .The man hangs out drinking in park all day. There are several people sitting in park all day drinking
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lower Clapton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dalston E8 two Lime bikes unlawfully obstructing footway, 11th August
item.description:
The numbers are in the attached photos. Selfish neighbours keep dumping Lime bikes on the footway outside the home of a visually impaired resident. Lime does NOT sanction their customers for doing this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Sandringham Road, Shacklewell, London
